articles.title: Nepal protests updates: PM Oli resigns, parliament torched, airport shut
articles.description: Nepal's Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli resigned after deadly protests against alleged government corruption resulted in 19 deaths. Protesters set the parliament building on fire and stormed the offices of political parties, leading to the closure of Kathmandu's international airport.

articles.title: Israeli military says it attacked Hamas leaders in Qatar's Doha
articles.description: The Israeli military has announced that it targeted senior Hamas leaders in an attack in Doha, Qatar. This marks a significant development in the ongoing conflict between Israel and Hamas.

articles.title: Atleast 60 people killed in overnight rebel attack in eastern Congo
articles.description: An overnight attack by rebels in eastern Congo has resulted in the deaths of at least 60 people. The attack highlights the ongoing violence and instability in the region.
